SRTM2Wayinfo Documentation
Author:
Hermann Kraus

Introduction

This program reads OpenStreetMap files and calculates the altitude differences along each way that has a "highway" tag. The "up" and "down" values are output separately, so you can decide if it is a hilly way where just the start and end node are at almost the same altitude or if the way is really flat.

This manual is divided in the following sections:

  • Installation
  • Usage
  • Output format
  • Program structure

If you have any problems using this program contact me at h e r m (at) s c r i b u s (dot) i n f o.
